assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Fullcast Holdings Co., Ltd., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the provision of human resource solutions in Japan. It operates through Short-Term Operational Support Business; Sales Support Business; and Security, Other Businesses segments. The Short-Term Operational Support Business segment provides short-term personnel services, human resource services for event operation, payroll management outsourcing services, and other services. The Sales Support Business segment involved in agency sales of telecommunications products, distributor sales and call center operations, and other services. The Security, Other Businesses segment provides security services, such as permanent security, crowd security, and traffic security, based on security contract agreements with customers in public facilities, corporations, and others. The company also provides paid-for employment placement services; worker dispatching services, which recruit, register, and dispatch temporary staff to client companies and other organizations; and business process outsourcing services, including general affairs, sales, accounting, payroll, sales and marketing, etc. In addition, it offers outsourcing services that provide subcontracting services such as food and beverage sales at event venues, call center operations, data entry, and light warehouse work based on customer contracts; merchandise sales services, providing agency services for telecommunication service contracts and other services; and staffing services provided to clients for hiring personnel. Fullcast Holdings Co., Ltd. was incorporated in 1990 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
